QuestData.Title: The Haunted Halls
QuestData.Description: Now, what was it you wanted? You're here to see the Tidestone of Golganneth? Hah! Ho ho ha ha haa!$b$bHooo my.$b$bNo, only the academy's headmistress has the keys to that chamber, and she hasn't opened the door in... oh, I'd say about ten thousand years.$b$bYou'd best be off to class, now. Go on, then! Into the west wing with you!
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, the headmistress is in her study, but I can't have you bothering her right now. Classes are about to start.
